00244             function                get_update_record( $New , $Original )
00245             {
00246                   try
00247                   {
00248                         $Update = array();
00249                         
00250                         foreach( $New as $Field => $NewValue )
00251                         {
00252                               $Field = str_replace( $this->Prefix.'_' , '' , $Field );
00253                               
00254                               if( @$Original->$Field == $NewValue )
00255                               {
00256                                     continue;
00257                               }
00258                               if( @$Original->$Field != $this->Security->get( $NewValue , 'unsafe_string' ) )
00259                               {
00260                                     @$Update[ $Field ] = $NewValue;
00261                                     continue;
00262                               }
00263                         }
00264                         
00265                         return( $Update );
00266                   }
00267                   catch( Exception $e )
00268                   {
00269                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00270                   }
00271             }

00295             function                pre_edit_validation( $Options )
00296             {
00297                   try
00298                   {
00299                         $Ids = $this->Security->get_gp( $this->Prefix.'_id' , 'raw' );
00300 
00301                         $RecordOriginal = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_record( $Options , $Ids );
00302                         
00303                         $ValidationScript = $Options->get_setting( 'custom_get_post_validation' );
00304                         $RecordNew = $this->Security->parse_http_parameters( $ValidationScript );
00305                         
00306                         $UpdateRecord = $this->get_update_record( $RecordNew , $RecordOriginal );
00307                         
00308                         $ValidationScript = explode( '#' , $ValidationScript );
00309                         
00310                         foreach( $ValidationScript as $s )
00311                         {
00312                               $s = str_replace( $this->Prefix.'_' , '' , $s );
00313                               $Field = explode( ':' , $s );
00314                               $Field = str_replace( $this->Prefix.'_' , '' , $Field[ 0 ] );
00315                               
00316                               if( isset( $UpdateRecord[ $Field ] ) )
00317                               {
00318                                     $Result = $this->Security->validate_custom_fields( $UpdateRecord , $s );
00319                                     if( $Result === false )
00320                                     {
00321                                           $this->PageComposer->add_error_message( $this->Security->ErrorMessage );
00322                                           return( $Result );
00323                                     }
00324                               }
00325                         }
00326                         
00327                         return( true );
00328                   }
00329                   catch( Exception $e )
00330                   {
00331                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00332                   }
00333             }

00353             function                record_view_form( $Options )
00354             {
00355                   try
00356                   {
00357                         $TemplateName = $Options->get_setting( 'form_template' , $this->Prefix.'_view_form.tpl' );
00358                         $ComponentPath = dirname( $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' ) );
00359                         $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( "$ComponentPath/res/templates/$TemplateName" );
00360                         
00361                         $Provider = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_provider( $Options , $this->Provider );
00362                   
00363                         $id = $this->Security->get_gp( $this->Prefix.'_id' , 'integer' );
00364                         $Records = call_user_func( array( $Provider , 'select_list' ) , $id );
00365 
00366                         $r = $Records[ 0 ];
00367                         
00368                         $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $r );
00369                         $this->Provider->Output = $Template;
00370                   }
00371                   catch( Exception $e )
00372                   {
00373                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00374                   }

00399                         $FormTemplateFileName = $Options->get_setting( 'form_template' );
00400                         $FilePath = $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' );

00403                         
00404                         $Changed = false;
00405                         
00406                         $Form = $this->process_string( $Options , $Form , $Changed );
00407

00448                         $this->ContextSetUtilities->set_header_template( $Options , $Paging );

00454                         
00455                         $Str = $Paging->draw( false , $Options );
00456                         
00457                         $Str = $this->process_string( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00458                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_prefix( $Str , $Changed );
00459                         $this->Provider->Output = $this->PageComposer->execute_processors( $Str , 'process_string' );
00460                         $Changed = false;
00461                   }
00462                   catch( Exception $e )

00498             function                run_execution( $Options , $Provider , $AutoRedirect = 0 )
00499             {
00500                   try
00501                   {
00502                         if( $this->Context->execute( $Options , $Provider ) )
00503                         {
00504                               $this->ContextSetUtilities->process_redirect( $Options , $AutoRedirect );
00505 
00506                               $this->GUI->set_var( 'last_context_set_execution_code' , 0 );
00507                               $this->GUI->set_var( 
00508                                     'last_context_set_execution_message' , $this->PageComposer->get_last_success_message()
00509                               );
00510                                     
00511                               return( true );
00512                         }
00513 
00514                         $this->GUI->set_var( 'last_context_set_execution_code' , 1 );
00515                         $this->GUI->set_var( 
00516                               'last_context_set_execution_message' , $this->PageComposer->get_last_error_message()
00517                         );
00518                         
00519                         return( false );
00520                   }
00521                   catch( Exception $e )
00522                   {
00523                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00524                   }
00525             }

00545             function                process_custom_configs( $Options )
00546             {
00547                   try
00548                   {
00549                         $this->Trace->start_group( "custom configs processing" , COMMON );
00550                         
00551                         foreach( $this->Contexts as $i => $ContextPath )
00552                         {
00553                               $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "Processing context $ContextPath" , COMMON );
00554                               
00555                               $Config = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $ContextPath );
00556                               $Config = str_replace( '{prefix}' , $this->Prefix , $Config );
00557                               
00558                               $CustomSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00559                               $CustomSettings->load_settings( $Config );
00560                               $CustomSettings->add_settings_from_object( $Options );
00561 
00562                               if( $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'success_func' , false ) == 'multy_call' )
00563                               {
00564                                     $this->Context->load_raw_config( $Config );
00565                                     
00566                                     $this->DefaultControllers->set_constants( $this , $Options );
00567                                     if( $this->run_execution( $CustomSettings , $this->DefaultControllers , 1 ) )
00568                                     {
00569                                           $this->clear();
00570                                           $this->Trace->end_group();
00571                                           return;
00572                                     }
00573                               }
00574                               elseif( $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'success_func' , false ) == 'simple_form' )
00575                               {
00576                                     $this->Context->load_raw_config( $Config );
00577                                     
00578                                     if( $this->run_execution( $CustomSettings , $this , 0 ) )
00579                                     {
00580                                           $this->clear();
00581                                           $this->Trace->end_group();
00582                                           return;
00583                                     }
00584                               }
00585                               elseif( $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'success_func' , false ) == 'list_view' )
00586                               {
00587                                     global                  $SkipCallParamsValidation;
00588                                     if( $SkipCallParamsValidation )
00589                                     {
00590                                           $CustomSettings->remove_setting( 'call_params_filter' );
00591                                     }
00592                                     
00593                                     $this->Context->load_config_from_object( $CustomSettings );
00594                                     
00595                                     if( $this->Context->execute( $CustomSettings , $this ) )
00596                                     {
00597                                           $this->clear();
00598                                           $this->Trace->end_group();
00599                                           return;
00600                                     }
00601                               }
00602                               elseif( $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'success_func' , false ) == 'record_view_form' )
00603                               {
00604                                     $this->Context->load_raw_config( $Config );
00605                                     
00606                                     if( $this->Context->execute( $CustomSettings , $this ) )
00607                                     {
00608                                           $this->clear();
00609                                           $this->Trace->end_group();
00610                                           return;
00611                                     }
00612                               }
00613                               else
00614                               {
00615                                     $OldProvider = $this->Provider;
00616                                     
00617                                     if( $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'provider_package_name' , false ) !== false )
00618                                     {
00619                                           $this->Provider = get_package(
00620                                                                         $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'provider_package_name' ) , 
00621                                                                         $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'provider_package_version' , 'last' ) , 
00622                                                                         __FILE__ );
00623                                     }
00624 
00625                                     $this->Context->load_raw_config( $Config );
00626                                     
00627                                     if( $this->run_execution( $CustomSettings , $this->Provider ) )
00628                                     {
00629                                           $OldProvider->Output = $this->Provider->Output;
00630                                           $this->clear();
00631                                           $this->Trace->end_group();
00632                                           return;
00633                                     }
00634                               }
00635                         }
00636                         
00637                         $this->Trace->end_group();
00638                   }
00639                   catch( Exception $e )
00640                   {
00641                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00642                   }
00643             }

00671             function                execute( $Options , $Provider , $FilePath )
00672             {
00673                   try
00674                   {
00675                         $this->Trace->start_group( "ContextSet::execute for class \"".get_class( $Provider )."\"" );
00676                         $this->Trace->add_trace_string( serialize( $Options->get_raw_settings() ) , COMMON );
00677                         
00678                         $Options->set_setting( 'file_path' , $FilePath );
00679                         $this->Provider = $Provider;
00680                         $this->Provider->Output = false;
00681 
00682                         $CommonSettingsConfigFileName = $Options->get_setting( 'common_settings_config' , 'cfcxs_context_set' );
00683                         $CommonSettingsConfigFilePath = dirname( $FilePath )."/conf/$CommonSettingsConfigFileName";
00684                         if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $CommonSettingsConfigFilePath ) )
00685                         {
00686                               $this->ContextSetSettings->load_file( $CommonSettingsConfigFilePath );
00687                               
00688                               $this->Version = intval( $this->ContextSetSettings->get_setting( 'version' , 0 ) );
00689                               $this->Prefix = $this->ContextSetSettings->get_setting( 'prefix' );
00690                               $this->Prefix = str_replace( 
00691                                     '{functionality}' , $this->ContextSetSettings->get_setting( 'functionality' , '' ) , 
00692                                     $this->Prefix
00693                               );
00694                               $this->Prefix = str_replace( 
00695                                     '{entity}' , $this->ContextSetSettings->get_setting( 'entity' , '' ) , $this->Prefix
00696                               );
00697                         }
00698 
00699                         if( $this->CommonStateStartup->run_commmon_states( $this , $Options ) !== false )
00700                         {
00701                               $this->clear();
00702                               $this->Trace->end_group();
00703                               return;
00704                         }
00705 
00706                         $this->process_custom_configs( $Options );
00707                         
00708                         $this->Trace->end_group();
00709                   }
00710                   catch( Exception $e )
00711                   {
00712                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00713                   }
00714             }

00796             function                process_prefix( $Str , $Changed )
00797             {
00798                   try
00799                   {
00800                         if( strpos( $Str , '{prefix}' ) !== false )
00801                         {
00802                               $Str = str_replace( '{prefix}' , $this->Prefix ,$Str );
00803                               $Changed = true;
00804                         }
00805                         
00806                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00807                   }
00808                   catch( Exception $e )
00809                   {
00810                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00811                   }
00812             }

00844             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00845             {
00846                   try
00847                   {
00848                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->CommonButtons->process_form_buttons( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00849                         
00850                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->ContextSetMarkup->process_object_line( $Str , $Changed );
00851                         
00852                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->ContextSetMarkup->process_options( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00853                         
00854                         return( $Str );
00855                   }
00856                   catch( Exception $e )
00857                   {
00858                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00859                   }

00884             function                process_exact_config( $Options )
00885             {
00886                   try
00887                   {
00888                         $this->clear();
00889                               
00890                         $PackageName = $Options->get_setting( 'package_name' , 0 );
00891                         $PackageVersion = $Options->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00892                         
00893                         $PackagePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00894                         $ConfigFileName = $Options->get_setting( 'config' );
00895                         
00896                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( $PackagePath )."/conf/$ConfigFileName" );
00897                         
00898                         $Object = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
00899                         
00900                         $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $Object , __FILE__ );
00901                         
00902                         return( get_field( $Object , 'Output' , false ) );
00903                   }
00904                   catch( Exception $e )
00905                   {
00906                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00907                   }
00908             }
